name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Quality Engineer with a solid foundation in **Kubernetes**, **AWS**, and **GitOps** practices, bringing over 13 years of experience in developing high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Adept in **Chaos Engineering** and performance tuning, leveraging tools such as **Chaos Mesh**, **Litmus**, and **AWS Fault Injection Simulator** to ensure robust and resilient application performance. Skilled in utilizing monitoring solutions like **CloudWatch**, **Prometheus**, and **HoneyComb** for real-time system diagnostics and performance assessments.

Proficient in cloud-native architectures using **AWS EKS** and distributed systems, I implement CI/CD pipelines to enhance development efficiency. I possess a strong understanding of compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 while working closely with cross-functional teams to foster collaboration and innovation. My background includes building AI/ML-driven platforms utilizing Python and frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**, with experience in MLOps frameworks such as **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
